interpretation: The "man getting massage" card represents a need for relaxation and self-care. It is a reminder to take a break from the stresses of everyday life and indulge in some pampering. This card also signifies the importance of physical touch and the healing power of human connection. It may suggest seeking out a massage or other form of bodywork to release tension and promote a sense of well-being. Alternatively, it could be a message to give oneself permission to rest and recharge. Keywords associated with this card include relaxation, rejuvenation, pampering, self-care, touch, and connection.
